backend/main.mo: Backend canister defining course, gallery, reviews, contact info, user profiles, and access‑controlled CRUD operations with blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing required frontend static‑asset image handling and homepage mission‑section update with associated components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file summarizing all major frontend components, pages, hooks, and config behavior for the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme file defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark modes and setting global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading favicon, fonts, and bootstrapping the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup using TanStack Router with theme provider and route definitions for all pages.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Reusable logo component rendering the uploaded brand image with optional text display and error fallback.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing logo, quick links, dynamic contact info, and branch details using data from the backend.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with logo, navigation links, and contact button, including mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page layout wrapper combining header, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity and clears queries on logout.
frontend/src/constants/brandAssets.ts: Defines the canonical, unmodifiable brand logo path.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, managing authentication state, login, logout, and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains data-fetching and mutation hooks for courses, gallery images, contact info, reviews, and admin actions using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind configuration defining global styles, dark mode variables, and custom accent-red utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard for managing courses, gallery images, contact info, review images, and submitted reviews.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders contact info and a form for international inquiries with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/CoursesPage.tsx: Displays courses grouped by category with loading skeletons and styled category badges.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Fetches and displays gallery images with hover captions, falling back to placeholders if empty.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home page with hero content, highlights, contact info, and a review submission form.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requirements, and state for using an uploaded photo unchanged.
